## 1

$F_T(t) = \int_{-\infty}^{t} f_T(t) dt$

$F_T(15) = \int_{-\infty}^{14} f_T(t) dt$

$1 - F_T(15) = 1 - \int_{-\infty}^{15} f_T(t) dt$

$P(T \ge 15) = 1 - \int_{0}^{15} 0.2 e^{-0.1t} - 0.2 e^{-0.2t} dt$

$P(T \ge 15) = 0.3964733$

# Code
```{r}
integrand <- function(t) { 0.2 * exp(-0.1 * t) - 0.2 * exp(-0.2 * t) }

1 - integrate(integrand, lower=0, upper=15)$value
```
